name: It Knows
description:
Made for the Themed Horror Game Jam #6

NOTE: Lighting in the web version has some weird bugs. Unfortunately, I don't think there's anything I can do about it -- it seems to be coming from the game engine. If you want the game to look a little nicer, you'll have to use the downloaded version.

You are a security guard in a museum. The current special exhibition is a collection of wax figurines entitled "Among the Stars", with celebrities displayed in formations based on popular constellations.

Most nights, you wander the halls alone. But tonight is different -- as you do your rounds, you have a sneaking suspicion that one of the statues is following you...

Default Controls (all rebindable):

WASD or arrow keys to move

Mouse to aim, left click to shoot

Music by Riccardo Stella

SFX from PMSFX and Freesounds
